pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of a cityscape with no camera movement. The scene captures a sprawling urban area with a dense downtown core of skyscrapers in the distance. In the foreground, there are lower-rise residential buildings and abundant green trees, with a large mountain range visible in the background under a partly cloudy sky.
